https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eI92GJnjSl2xT0APisSOh9mWMfc.jpg How far would you go for love? Holden will soon find out the answer to that question as he reaches to the depths of insanity for that one true love. "Bloodstained Romance" is a chilling love story told through the eyes of a killer, and has been deemed "undeniably realistic and extremely creepy". Bloodstained Romance
